Package org.hibernate.spatial.criterion

Class Summary
DWithinExpression  
ExpressionUtil This class assists in the formation of a SQL-fragment in the various spatial query expressions.
HavingSridExpression  
IsEmptyExpression  
SpatialFilter An implementation for a simple spatial filter.
SpatialProjections  
SpatialRelateExpression An implementation of the Criterion interface that implements spatial queries: queries to the effect that a geometry property has a specific spatial relation to a test geometry
SpatialRestrictions Static Factory Class for creating spatial criterion types.
